sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Close out this operation as completed
break up the MAC responses into individual device strings
What's the original?

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: iterate through each device returned from the REST query

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: in:devices macAddress:(mac1,mac2,...,mac50)
Add/update an entry in the Armis Device Table for this device
Ignore the record we are told to get, we want to process up to 50 MACs at once.
